HipsSTHipAbduction.name: Suspended Hip Abduction
HipsSTHipAbduction.preparation: Sit on floor facing suspension trainer loops in low position. Grasp bottom of loops, then lay supine. Raise legs and place heels in loops with soles contacting handles. Extend legs out and place arms on floor off to sides. Straighten low back, knees, and hips, raising back and hips off of floor.
HipsSTHipAbduction.execution: Pull legs apart as far as possible. Return by placing legs together and repeat.
HipsSTHipAbduction.comments: See Suspended Supine Feet MountDismount. Keep low back straight, maintaining approximate height from floor throughout movement.This exercise can be performed on TRX style suspension trainer. See ROM Criteria and Spot Reduction Myth. Easier Movement can be made easier by lying closer under anchor of suspension trainer. Harder Movement can be made more challenging by lying further back, away horizontally from anchor of suspension trainer.
